overview: Rocco called to invite me to the Erotic Video Show in Barcelona. There we find the Scandinavian blonde beauty, Christina and sultry blonde Sabina. We get lost in Germany find ourselves some sexual intrigue with Kelly Trump. We met Marine Cartier on the French Riviera. Then Rocco and I bust some bubble-butts in Prague. Wish you were here!
title: Buttman's European Vacation 3
